title: Patient Leaves a Negative Online Review
summary: You discover a harsh online review criticizing your professionalism. Respond with composure: calm, brief, invite offline—reputation grows when ego shrinks.

scene.setting: You discover a harsh online review criticizing your professionalism. You may feel angry or defensive; the hidden risk is reacting publicly with emotion and hurting credibility. The decision point is defend reputation vs respond with composure.

beats.narration: The review is visible. The decision point is respond aggressively or calmly invite offline.

dialogue.speaker: lead
dialogue.line: We're sorry they had this experience. We take feedback seriously and would like to discuss offline. Please contact the practice.

choices.label: Respond aggressively and correct the facts.

steps.step: Replace with calm, brief reply: sorry for experience; take feedback seriously; invite contact.

leader_lines: We're sorry. We take feedback seriously. We'd like to discuss—please contact us.
How do we respond to negative reviews?
questions: No arguing or correcting in public?
Thank for feedback and offer to discuss?
scripts.closing_line: Calm, brief; invite offline; no arguing in public.

choices.label: Respond calmly and invite discussion offline.

steps.step: Post calm reply: sorry they had this experience; we take feedback seriously; invite them to contact the practice.
Reach out offline if possible; listen first then address; document and improve if needed.

leader_lines: We're sorry they had this experience. We take feedback seriously. Please contact us so we can discuss.
questions: What do you say in a calm public reply?
How do we follow up offline?
scripts.closing_line: Sorry; take feedback seriously; invite contact; then offline.

choices.label: Ignore the review and do nothing.

steps.step: When review is visible and specific: brief, professional response; then address root cause offline.

leader_lines: Ignoring leaves the last word to them. We'll post a brief, professional response.
scripts.closing_line: Brief professional response; then root cause offline.

choices.label: Respond briefly with empathy and a contact offer; then follow up privately.

steps.step: Brief empathy and contact offer in public.
Call or email to understand; listen first then address; document and improve.

leader_lines: We're sorry. We'd like to hear more—please contact us.
Brief empathy often defuses and elevates.
questions: How do we follow up offline?
scripts.closing_line: Listen first; address; document and improve.

system_prompts.mirror_call: Did you defend or respond with composure?

outcomes.message: Readers may have sided with the patient. Credibility can drop.
reflection_questions: What would have changed with calm-and-invite-offline?
How do you respond to negative reviews?

outcomes.message: You showed composure. Readers see professionalism; you may resolve the issue privately.
reflection_questions: What did the calm reply accomplish?
How do you follow up offline?

tsp.weekly_pulse_prompt: This week I responded to a negative review with composure. (1-5)
